pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Superwise Python SDK### A python SDK to integrate with SuperwiseIn order to use this library you need:```python > 3.0```### InstallUse pip to install the Superwise SDK```pip install superwise```## VersioningWe use [SemVer](http://semver.org/) for versioning. For all available versions, see the [tags in this repository](https://github.com/your/project/tags).For getting started, HOWTOs, jupyter notebooks examples etc., head over to the Superwise documentation portal: https://docs.superwise.ai/## LicenseThe Superwise SDK is released under the MIT licence (See LICENSE file)
